headline20: Critical operational constraints are flagged at 7 airports right now.
management45: Critical operational constraints are flagged at 7 airports right now. No engine anti-ice operations are currently flagged. Across base airports: 3 critical, 23 high, 7 medium, 6 normal. Key bases needing attention include London Luton (LTN/EGGW), London Gatwick (LGW/EGKK) and Copernicus Wrocław (WRO/EPWR); plus 23 other bases. 7 additional base airports are at medium severity and should be monitored closely. At base airports, the dominant pattern is snow-related runway contamination risk, low cloud base and mist  — most notably around Craiova (CRA/LRCV), Iaşi (IAS/LRIA) and Suceava Stefan cel Mare (SCV/LRSV). Network hotspots: Craiova (CRA/LRCV), Sandefjord Airport, Torp (TRF/ENTO), Billund (BLL/EKBI), Stockholm-Arlanda (ARN/ESSA), Iaşi (IAS/LRIA) and 2 others. Primary drivers: low cloud base, cold‑temperature performance penalties and snow / blowing snow. Expected impact is reduced runway capacity with higher delay and diversion risk, especially where visibility/RVR and cloud base are very low. Since the last update, 12 airports changed status, led by Craiova (CRA/LRCV), Sandefjord Airport, Torp (TRF/ENTO), Billund (BLL/EKBI) and 9 others.
detail90: Critical operational constraints are flagged at 7 airports right now. Base airports (focus): London Luton (LTN/EGGW) — HIGH: fog; visibility down to 200 m, cloud base around 0 ft | London Gatwick (LGW/EGKK) — HIGH: strong gusts risk; cloud base around 400 ft | Copernicus Wrocław (WRO/EPWR) — HIGH: mist; visibility down to 1.2 km, cloud base around 200 ft | Iaşi (IAS/LRIA) — CRIT: mist; snow; runway contamination risk | Katowice Wojciech Korfanty (KTW/EPKT) — HIGH: fog; visibility down to 700 m, cloud base around 100 ft; forecast below approach minima at times | Bucharest Henri Coandă (OTP/LROP) — HIGH: fog; visibility down to 150 m, cloud base around 100 ft; forecast below approach minima at times and 20 others. Worst affected now: Craiova (CRA/LRCV) — CRIT: fog; visibility down to 150 m, RVR down to 175 m, cloud base around 100 ft; below approach minima (current METAR) (drivers: low-visibility procedures (reduced capacity), runway visual range (RVR) constraints, approach minima limits) | Sandefjord Airport, Torp (TRF/ENTO) — CRIT: snow; cold-temperature performance penalties; strong gusts risk (drivers: cold-temperature performance penalties, snow/blowing snow) | Billund (BLL/EKBI) — CRIT: mist; snow; runway contamination risk (drivers: runway contamination / reduced braking, cold-temperature performance penalties, low ceilings) | Stockholm-Arlanda (ARN/ESSA) — CRIT: snow; cold-temperature performance penalties; visibility down to 2.3 km, cloud base around 300 ft (drivers: cold-temperature performance penalties, low ceilings, snow/blowing snow) | Iaşi (IAS/LRIA) — CRIT: mist; snow; runway contamination risk (drivers: approach minima limits, runway contamination / reduced braking, cold-temperature performance penalties) | Bacău George Enescu (BCM/LRBC) — CRIT: mist; snow; cold-temperature performance penalties (drivers: runway visual range (RVR) constraints, approach minima limits, cold-temperature performance penalties) and 1 others. Changed since last run: Craiova (CRA/LRCV), Sandefjord Airport, Torp (TRF/ENTO), Billund (BLL/EKBI), Stockholm-Arlanda (ARN/ESSA), Iaşi (IAS/LRIA), Bacău George Enescu (BCM/LRBC), Suceava Stefan cel Mare (SCV/LRSV), Frankfurt-Hahn (HHN/EDFH), Berlin Brandenburg Willy Brandt (BER/EDDB), Kraków John Paul II (KRK/EPKK) and 2 others.
